Posts.Content: Jo-Ann129 wrote: Hello to All, I am turning to you for some help and info.  I had a mammogram on 01/07/09.  Received a VM from the hospital this past Tuesday advising that the doctor who read the films wants me to return for a retake and U/S on my left breast.  I spoke with my doctor and she advised that there was an asymmetrical nodule about 10 millimeters in size. She also said since it is so small I shouldn't worry to much at this point.  It may just be a lymph node. I am scheduled for the retake in 11 days and, as I have read here so many times, the wait is the worst.  Can you help me to understand what an asymmetrical nodule means or could mean.  Thank you for any information you can provide. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Asymmetrical Nodule Jo-Ann129 leaf
